TunableList.name: CARRY_COMPATIBLE_WALKSTYLE_OVERRIDE_MAP
TunableList.description: Provides an override to a given walkstyle if this Sim is carrying another Sim. (ie. horse riding with a carried sim).

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The walkstyle to override when carrying a Sim.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: A list of tested walkstyles which can be used to override the walkstyle from an incoming walkstyle request. The first passing walkstyle will be selected. If no tests pass, the walkstyle from the request will be used.

TunableTuple.description: A tuple containing a walkstyle and the tests they need to pass to be selected.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: The tests used to determine if this walkstyle should be selected as an override.

Tunable.name: walkstyle
Tunable.description: A walkstyle that can be used as an override if its tests pass.
